title: Game of Throws: Inside Darts
overview: Ever wondered what the build-up to the biggest darts tournament of the year is like? Ever wondered how Michael van Gerwen deals with pressure? Ever wondered what Luke Littler's life was like before his meteoric rise? Well, now you can find out.Following a whole host of players in the build-up to the 2023/24 tournament, Game of Throws: Inside Darts follows the personalities behind the players as they take on the biggest stage of them all at the 'people's palace'.
